docblock.long-description:
Pass the constructor an associative array:

[type] -> 'insert', 'update', 'delete', 'select' [table] -> "table name" [fields] -> An associative array of fields and their values. $fields["field_name"] = ["field_value"] [filter_phrase] -> The full SQL "where" phrase used to filter results [order] -> order by phrase [group] -> group by phrase [limit] -> limit phrase

tag.name: var
tag.description: The array of all of the query parts

tag.name: var
tag.description: The type of query we are building

tag.name: var
tag.description: The table(s) in the SQL statement

tag.name: var
tag.description: The fields(s) in the SQL statement

tag.name: var
tag.description: The filtering phrase in the SQL statement

tag.name: var
tag.description: The order by phrase in the SQL statement

tag.name: var
tag.description: The group by phrase in the SQL statement

tag.name: var
tag.description: The limit phrase in the SQL statement

docblock.description: DT Structure Class Abstract Data Transaction Structure Class

tag.name: var
tag.description: Data source type (mysql, mysqli, pgsql, ldap, oracle, mssql, db2, sqlsrv, sqlite)

tag.name: var
tag.description: Server address to use when connecting to the data source

tag.name: var
tag.description: Server port to use when connecting to the data source

tag.name: var
tag.description: Database or directory to use when connecting to the data source

tag.name: var
tag.description: Database instance to use when connecting to the data source

tag.name: var
tag.description: User to use when connecting to the data source

tag.name: var
tag.description: Password to use when connecting to the data source

tag.name: var
tag.description: Connection handle of the current data source connection

tag.name: var
tag.description: Resource ID of the data source record set

tag.name: var
tag.description: Number of rows in the record set returned

tag.name: var
tag.description: Number of rows affected by query

tag.name: var
tag.description: Number of fields in the record set returned

tag.name: var
tag.description: ID of the last inserted row for the current connection

tag.name: var
tag.description: User is bound to data source for this transaction (true or false)

tag.name: var
tag.description: A prepared SQL Statement handle or FALSE when invalid or not set.

tag.name: var
tag.description: Options that affect the current instantiated object

tag.name: var
tag.description: Is this the first use of this data source?

tag.name: var
tag.description: The Data Result Object for the last run query with this object.

tag.name: var
tag.description: A flag to determine if the results from the query have been saved/cached.
